title: 'Disgusting': Trump marks one year of Mueller
text:
'Disgusting': Trump marks one year of Mueller 11:54am BST - 02:16
Special Counsel Robert Mueller has told President Donald Trump’s legal team he would follow Justice Department guidance that a president cannot be indicted, according to Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Special Counsel Robert Mueller has told President Donald Trump’s legal team he would follow Justice Department guidance that a president cannot be indicted, according to Trump lawyer Rudy Giuliani.
